AuthFailureLoggingThreshold.description: This property enables you to view and configure logging criteria for failed authentications. A failed login log entry is recorded after the configured number of attempts. 0 = feature disabled; 1-3 and 5 are allowable values.

MinPasswordLength.description: This property specifies the minimum number of characters allowed when a user password is set or changed. It must be a value from 0 to 39.
